disconnected.title: Connect Doppler with your easycommerce store
disconnected.subtitle: Integrate all information from your easycommerce Customers and Contacts into your Doppler Lists automatically. Just follow the steps below.
disconnected.store_placeholder: Put the URL of your easycommerce store
disconnected.connection_error: Oops! We could not connect with your easycommerce store please try again later.

connected.title: Synchronize data entities with Subscriber Lists
connected.subtitle_list_count: You currently have {{availableLists}} Lists. Be aware that you can sync Lists manually whenever you want.
connected.subtitle: Select the easycommerce entity and the Doppler List you wish to synchronize. Contacts belonging to that entity will be automatically imported into the List.
connected.selected_list_subtitle: At this moment you have 1 List. Keep in mind that you can manually synchronize it any time you want.
connected.select_list_warning: If the chosen List already has associated Contacts, they will be removed. Only Contacts that have come from the integration will be saved.

delete_mode_grid.message: The synchronization will be permanently deleted. Are you sure?

disconnect_popup.title: Are you sure you want to disconnect this integration?
disconnect_popup.description: By confirming this disconnection, your List will no longer receive new Subscribers from your easycommerce account. Anyhow, you won't lose the contacts synced up to this moment.

mapping.title: Map fields
mapping.subtitle: Take benefit of the data from your contacts in other apps to expand your Doppler list. If you canâ€™t find the same field among the options you can personalize it or omit it.
mapping.empty_email_error_message: Ouch! There must be at least one Email field selected.

status.title: Your easycommerce store is already connected to Doppler
status.subtitle: Your Contacts were integrated automatically from your store by the Doppler extension for easycommerce. You can also import your products into Email Templates and create Abandoned Cart and Product Retargeting Automations. Any doubts? Press
